title: Language filter
body: Hey so I was one of the beta testers for the now live client. Since beta I've had the language filter disabled and yet my in game chat is filled with people using cuss words to have them be replaced with **** everytime. I'm not saying its a bad thing but its annoying to say the least. Any riot employees got a fix for this?

replies.body:
You may need to toggle your filter manually while in-game.  The command for this should be** /chatfilter**

Sorry if you had to hear some sensitive words, though I hope that helps!
